items.name: Black Is Beautiful Imperial Stout
items.desc:
An Imperial Stout brewed with coffee from River Coffee and blueberries.
Brewed in collaboration with Weathered Souls Brewing, 100% of the proceeds of this beer will go to organisations that campaign for police reform and support equality and inclusion for people of colour.
440ml / 10.0% ABV
Allergens: Gluten, (Barley, Oats) Vegan Friendly

items.name: Collision India Pale Ale
items.desc:
A dank and juicy India Pale Ale, featuring a large dose of spelt malt and flaked oats, liberally hopped with Mosaic and Columbus.
440ml / 6.2% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Spelt, Oats)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Conflux Pale Ale
items.desc:
Conflux is our house Pale Ale, soft and tropical featuring flaked oats and a light touch of rye malt, liberally hopped with Citra and Azacca.
440ml / 4.8% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats, Rye)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Little Tall Island DDH Pale Ale
items.desc:
Super soft pale ale dry-hopped with El Dorado, Amarillo and Simcoe at double the amount we use in our regular pale ales.
440ml / 5.2% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Nocturne Oatmeal Porter
items.desc:
A full and silky Porter with liberal amounts of flaked oats and a complex blend of British and German roasted malts.
440ml / 5.0% ABV
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats)
Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Prinzen Köln Style Lager
items.desc:
Prinzen is the latest addition to our family of core/seasonal beers. A crisp, clean, and refreshing top-fermented lagerbier hopped with Huell Melon for a bit of extra fruitiness.
440ml / 4.6% ABV
HOPS: Huell Melon
MALT: Bamberg Pils, Best Chitt Malt
YEAST: Köln
ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley)

items.name: Stylus Golden Ale
items.desc:
A sessionable, crisp and fruity Golden Ale produced in collaboration with our close friends Overdraft Beer & Taqueria. Brewed to drink with food, friends and good times.
440ml / 4.0% ABV
Allergens: Barley - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Tranquilo Pale Ale
items.desc:
A wheat heavy pale ale, low bitterness, high juice, hopped with Cryo Mosaic and Falconer’s Flight.
440ml / 5.0% ABV
Allergens: Barley, wheat, oats - Vegan Friendly
